Title: Glorious girl
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社)
Notes: A mail carrier delivers letters to a young female model worker. She is already holding some letters and a book on agricultural science.The poem left under the image:勞動模範眞光榮, 遠方來信一封,千句話,一句: 學習姑娘好勞動.The model worker is truly glorious, letters are sent from afar,a thousand phrases, one sentence: learn from young women to work well.
